project_descr: The Trinidad and Tobago Juvenile Court Project seeks to achieve juvenile justice reform and embrace global standards in adjudication involving children and guarantee their rights in accordance with United Nations Convention of the Rights of a Child.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
